div.bibl: Skandinaven (Daily Edition), July 25, 1909. KNIGHTS OF THE WHITE CROSS

body.p: The Knights of the White Cross have decided to gather the English-speaking Norsemen into its fold, and this month they are organizing an English-speaking lodge. The ceremony will take place at Scholl Hall, North and Central Park Avenues. After the Lodge has been organized and the officers elected, a reception will be held. The committee elected to take care of the installation and reception is busily at work.
